snippet: Thailand’s junta, which took power on May 22, appointed a 200-member interim legislature on Thursday.
abstract: Thailand’s junta appoints 200-member interim legislature which includes 105 people who hold military ranks and 11 from the police, as well as 84 civilian members.
lead_paragraph: Thailand’s junta, which took power on May 22, appointed a 200-member interim legislature on Thursday.

headline.main: Thailand: Military Junta Appoints Interim Legislature
headline.print_headline: Thailand: Military Junta Appoints Interim Legislature
